statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: PM Room defines a sequence A = {A1, A2,..., AN}, each of which is either 0 or 1. In order to beat him, programmer Moor has to construct another sequence B = {B1, B2,... , BN} of the same length, which satisfies that:

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
The input consists of multiple test cases. The number of test cases T(T<=100) occurs in the first line of input.

For each test case:
The first line contains a single integer N (1<=N<=100000), which denotes the length of A and B.
The second line consists of N integers, where the ith denotes Ai.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: Output the minimal f (A, B) when B is optimal and round it to 6 decimals.
